title: No Urf For April?
body: I thought urf normally happens on april 1st or something

replies.body: I think they didn't have URF this year (for April) because they have special game modes like every week now, and URF is part of those rotating game modes, meaning it's not limited to April now.
But URF only happened twice last year, if I remember correctly. And one of those was ARURF, which isn't nearly as fun.
